item.title: About Csmertx & Website
item.description: Purpose of this website Storage space for notes and future projects. Some of these notes may help Linux beginners, but most are for quick reference. About Me I have considerable hands on experience with Linux and computers. My time with Linux started at the beginning of 2013. I have been using computers for fun, work, and school since 1987. That said, my credentials are in my config files, and so I am not an authority of computer science.
